message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value for me. This unique item is not just a possession but a symbol of excellence and craftsmanship. Given its significance to me, I am extending this exclusive offer to you at a special price of $900000. I believe this price reflects the quality and potential value of the product while allowing us to come to a mutually beneficial agreement. I look forward to discussing the details with you and potentially bringing this remarkable item into your collection.
